modName: Raven42 Daedric Corset WITH light gloves boots and helmet
summary: A small edit of Raven42\'s esp to include light gloves and boots for the daedric set.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, I am Fluffkins(aka LazyLionus)!

I made this small modification of Raven42\'s esp in order to allow having a full daedric corset set (with boots and gloves, not just the cuirass).

The file is just the ESP so you\'ll need to download the full mod here: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4081

And remember to endorse it (rather than this one)!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++NEW!++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Added a light version of garryg\'s standalone daedric plate helmet. This is an optional file and to use it you ABSOLUTELY NEED garryg\'s original mod (and endorse him rather than me).

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3104 

Just use his mod, but replace his esp with mine.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++SSCredits:+++++++++++++++++++++++++

For Screenshots I use CBBE, XCE, Coolsims hair, and more.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++Version Info:+++++++++++++++++++++++++

Version 0.23:
Fixed a faulty FormID which caused the light temper recipe to override the original. Thanks to cyntelruniya for pointing this out!

Version 0.22:
Added helmet.
Changed weight of items to match other light armor sets (using elven as template).
author: Fluffkins
